name: compile
body:
### The following steps for how to build u-boot for BananaPi
```
$ git clone https://github.com/LeMaker/u-boot-sunxi.git
$ cd u-boot-sunxi
$ export ARCH=arm
$ export CROSS_COMPILE=arm-linux-gnueabihf-gcc
$ make BananaPi_config
$ make
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
